descendants.content: Essentially a wet bulb event is a weather condition where the air is too humid for evaporative cooling...humans use sweating to cool down, in a wet bulb event you can't cool down through sweating

descendants.content:
@robchapman EVERY kid, 9 to 99yo should go see a launch, at least once.

It's undescribable with mere words. The roar of a candle, lit by millennia of humans working towards breaking free of our gravity well, reaching out to the shores of the sky.

#NASA #KSC #Florida

descendants.content:
@robchapman FWIW, in the event of another visit, even in Summer!, I strongly suggest stepping out of the circuit of touristy Fla, and hitting Central-North #Florida #Springs.

It's legit faerie land stuff. (#Itchetucknee Springs head spring pool shown in pic)

And if you DO come by, let me know; I'll bring the snorkel gear for everyone:)
